data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Koch Bihar, West Bengal, India.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Koch Bihar, West Bengal, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Koch Bihar, West Bengal, India.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Koch Bihar, West Bengal, India.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, please give the church in the county of Koch Bihar prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Koch Bihar, West Bengal, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Kurol people.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 2,753,885 who are far from you in Koch Bihar, West Bengal, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 31,010 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.section_summary:
the county of Koch Bihar, West Bengal, India has a population of 2,819,100.

We estimate Koch Bihar has 31,010 people who might know Jesus, 34,205 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,753,885 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Koch Bihar with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.
